detail: Sebastian Malory (spelled 'Sebastien' in-game), formerly known as 'Sir Perceval', was one of the senior knights of The Order, and a supporting character in The Order: 1886. He served as a mentor and long-time friend of the game's protagonist, Grayson. The second Knight to hold the title of 'Sir Perceval' after his father, Malory having no offspring was succeeded by his apprentice, Marquis de Lafayette.
